state_summary: Fizz, a college social app, expands into grocery delivery through a partnership with Gopuff, allowing students to order essentials within minutes. The expansion was driven by user demand and Fizz's existing marketplace features.
evidence: Fizz is available on over 620 campuses across the US
The social platform allows students to connect anonymously with others at their university
Students were already using Fizz to buy and sell through the Fizz Marketplace and coordinate group food delivery
Gopuff was founded by college students and has a strong presence on campuses, making it a natural fit for Fizz
keywords: Fiz, Gopuff, grocery delivery, college social app, marketplace, Gen Z DNA
